001
002package io.vrap.rmf.base.client.http;
003
004import java.util.function.Supplier;
005
006import org.slf4j.Logger;
007import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
008
009/**
010 * Unified logger instance to perform logging only for configured logging levels.
011 * Creates a hierarchy of loggers for requests and responses
012 */
013public class InternalLogger {
014    private final Logger underlyingLogger;
015
016    public static final String TOPIC_REQUEST = "request";
017    public static final String TOPIC_RESPONSE = "response";
018
019    protected InternalLogger(final Logger underlyingLogger) {
020        this.underlyingLogger = underlyingLogger;
021    }
022
023    public static InternalLogger getLogger(final Class<?> clazz) {
024        return new InternalLogger(LoggerFactory.getLogger(clazz));
025    }
026
027    public static InternalLogger getLogger(final String loggerName) {
028        return new InternalLogger(LoggerFactory.getLogger(loggerName));
029    }
030
031    public boolean isTraceEnabled() {
032        return underlyingLogger.isTraceEnabled();
033    }
034
035    public InternalLogger debug(final Supplier<Object> message) {
036        if (underlyingLogger.isDebugEnabled()) {
037            underlyingLogger.debug(message.get().toString());
038        }
039        return this;
040    }
041
042    public InternalLogger debug(final Supplier<Object> message, final Throwable throwable) {
043        if (underlyingLogger.isDebugEnabled()) {
044            underlyingLogger.debug(message.get().toString(), throwable);
045        }
046        return this;
047    }
048
049    public InternalLogger info(final Supplier<Object> message) {
050        if (underlyingLogger.isInfoEnabled()) {
051            underlyingLogger.info(message.get().toString());
052        }
053        return this;
054    }
055
056    public InternalLogger trace(final Supplier<Object> message) {
057        if (isTraceEnabled()) {
058            underlyingLogger.trace(message.get().toString());
059        }
060        return this;
061    }
062
063    public InternalLogger trace(final Supplier<Object> message, final Throwable throwable) {
064        if (underlyingLogger.isTraceEnabled()) {
065            underlyingLogger.trace(message.get().toString(), throwable);
066        }
067        return this;
068    }
069
070    public InternalLogger warn(final Supplier<Object> message) {
071        if (underlyingLogger.isWarnEnabled()) {
072            underlyingLogger.warn(message.get().toString());
073        }
074        return this;
075    }
076
077    public InternalLogger error(final Supplier<Object> message) {
078        if (underlyingLogger.isErrorEnabled()) {
079            underlyingLogger.error(message.get().toString());
080        }
081        return this;
082    }
083
084    public InternalLogger error(final Supplier<Object> message, final Throwable throwable) {
085        if (underlyingLogger.isErrorEnabled()) {
086            underlyingLogger.error(message.get().toString(), throwable);
087        }
088        return this;
089    }
090}
